name: PolicyType
title: Policy Type
description: Policy Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: A basic level of coverage for owner-occupied residential properties with named perils protection.

designation.value: Assurance des propriétaires occupants - Formule abrégée
Seguro de propietarios - Formulario limitado

concept.definition: A mid-level coverage form for owner-occupied homes providing broader protection than limited form.

designation.value: Assurance des propriétaires occupants - Formule standard
Seguro de propietarios - Formulario estándar

concept.definition: An enhanced version of the standard form with additional coverages or higher limits.

designation.value: Assurance des propriétaires occupants - Formule standard augmentée
Seguro de propietarios - Formulario estándar ampliado

concept.definition: A comprehensive coverage level for owner-occupied residences with extended perils coverage.

designation.value: Assurance des propriétaires occupants - Formule étendue
Seguro de propietarios - Formulario amplio

concept.definition: The most extensive coverage form for owner-occupied homes, typically providing all-risk protection.

designation.value: Assurance des propriétaires occupants - Formule générale
Seguro de propietarios - Formulario integral

concept.definition: An enhanced comprehensive form with additional coverage extensions beyond the standard comprehensive form.

designation.value: Assurance des propriétaires occupants - Formule générale augmentée
Seguro de propietarios - Formulario integral ampliado

concept.definition: A minimum coverage package with basic protection features for owner-occupied dwellings.

designation.value: Assurance des propriétaires occupants - Minimum + Protection
Seguro de propietarios - Mínimo + Protección

concept.definition: A homeowners form type that does not fit standard categories.

designation.value: Formulaire d'assurance des propriétaires occupants - Autre
Seguro de propietarios - Otro formulario

concept.definition: A basic coverage package for renters protecting personal property and liability with named perils.

Seguro de inquilinos - Formulario limitado

concept.definition: A standard level coverage for renters with broader protection than limited form.

Seguro de inquilinos - Formulario estándar

concept.definition: An extensive coverage form for renters offering enhanced protection for contents and liability.

designation.value: Police multirisque des locataires - formule étendue
Seguro de inquilinos - Formulario amplio

concept.definition: The most comprehensive coverage for renters, typically providing all-risk protection for personal property.

designation.value: Assurance des locataires - Formule générale
Seguro de inquilinos - Formulario integral

concept.definition: An enhanced comprehensive tenants form with additional coverage extensions.

designation.value: Assurance des locataires - Formule générale augmentée
Seguro de inquilinos - Formulario integral ampliado

concept.definition: A tailored coverage package designed for senior renters with age-appropriate features.

Seguro de inquilinos - Paquete para personas mayores

concept.definition: A tenants form type that does not fit standard categories.

designation.value: Formulaire d'assurance des locataires - Autre
Seguro de inquilinos - Otro formulario

Formulario de propietario de vivienda
